name: Work in progress.
description: Thank you for joining Lenom, we now need some time to build a friendly directory for you and your coworkers. We will let you know by email when we are ready.
quote: We dig dig dig dig dig dig dig dig.

name: Pardon?
description: We cannot understand your request. Please try something else.

name: This is forbidden
description: You are not allowed to perform this request. Are you using the right account?

name: Noone here...
description: We did not find anyone or anything yet. But we will, if you try someting else.
quote: I will look for you. I will find you.

name: That's sad.
description: Thank you for joining. Sadly, your account does not belong to any Organisation. It won't work with Lenom at the moment.

name: It broke.
description: Something broke on our side, Please try again.
quote: It will not break. It will not break. It broke
